original_title: Not Violent, I Promise, I Swear
overview: Created in only 24 hours for the Okotoks 24hr Horror Film Festival 2021 and withdrawn at the last second. "Not, Violent, I Promise, I Swear", is a film about a random group of people who take shelter in a house during a Kaiju attack.
tagline: The Kaiju isn't the problem, it's the people you're hiding with.
title: Not Violent, I Promise, I Swear
